attributes.action: ban drivers who are found guilty of having caused death by dangerous driving permanently from obtaining a driving license of any kind.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone found guilty of having caused death by dangerous driving, should be banned from driving any kind of vehicle for life and have their driving license permanently revoked. Those found driving a vehicle one issued with this penalty should face a minimum of 10 years jail-term and be fined.
